channel.description: hay sup i play world of warcraft but havent played in like .... at least 6 months lol but yea its kinda of boring with out it :D so boring omg and RUNESCAPE is so boring also :( and uhh yea so anyone want to talk about WoW reply kk :D

item.title: World of warcraft :P
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

h4xx0rz:

aj pwns, quit SPAMMING! I’ve seen 5 posts today, all full with spam. “Ha i know i dont have a job” “hhahahah this is fun” and “ga make em big glasses” don’t have any content, don’t help ANYBODY at moparisthebest, and you are not making a very good first impression.

I guess you didn’t make a good impression either…
This was your first post:

[quote=“h4xx0rz, post:14, topic:4131”]lol one time i sent summat in it said “fuck andrew and his gay co-workers, runescape sucks dick” and then it was an auto response it said somethin along the lines of "sorry your ban appeal has been denied, although we in atliacs one final chance. please read over the rules and code of conduct before playing again.- sincerely
jagex[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:13:51 PM[/size][hr]sorry i meant to spell itiliacs and we have decided to give you one final chance[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:15:20 PM[/size][hr]and i was like “what the hell jagex really is gay…” so i decided to play private servers…jsut to piss off jagex…lol then i really liked private servers :-P[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:16:20 PM[/size][hr]i ll make mine in 7331, l0lz3rz 0||3 11|/|3 1 53||1 50|/|31|-|1||6 1|| 11 0f “f()(k 4ndr3w 4nd |-|is g4y c0-|/0rk3rz, r00n5c4p3 5()(k5 [)1(k” and then it was an auto response it said somethin along the lines of "sorry your ban appeal has been denied, although we in atliacs one final chance. please read over the rules and code of conduct before playing again.- sincerely
jagex
[br][size=1]Posted at: July 29, 2006, 12:20:58 PM[/size][hr]sorry wasnt gonna waste my time doin the whole thing = but one time i sent in a complete leet message to jagex i was swearin n shit and they send a emssage back and it said the autp-ban appeal message lmao. i wasnt even appealing a ban jsut screwing around lol.[/quote]

item.title: World of warcraft :P
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

h4xx0rz:

Not a good first impression, junior.

You know, putting people down like that (trying to make them feel inferior to you by using words like ‘junior’) makes you nothing more then a dickhead. Keep it up; you’ll discover that people won’t want to know you in no time at all.

Anyway, don’t play WoW! Everyone gets hooked. Take our very own Mopman, or Tree, for example. He’s on IRC occasionally, sleeps occasionally, and spends every other hour playing WoW.
